item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>It's not so much the links in the posts, but the website of the commenter that's the problem, I can't think of an easy way of automating the filtering for that short of just removing the field altogether which would be a pity.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
It’s not so much the links in the posts, but the website of the commenter that’s the problem, I can’t think of an easy way of automating the filtering for that short of just removing the field altogether which would be a pity.

Matt

item.title: By: Vince Schuurman
item.dc:creator: Vince Schuurman
item.description: <p>Tip: Block any post with more than ... links in it <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKU/$File/tongue.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Tip: Block any post with more than … links in it http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKU/$File/tongue.gif“ />
